LanguageData.AC_YeLongRouWan.label: Yelong Meatball
LanguageData.AC_YeLongRouWan.description: Meatballs are traditional food in a certain region. This Yelong Meatball has a lot of merits. A plate of Meatballs has four colors, one base color, one red, one blue and one green. The difference is that the sandwich tastes are different. This is a new dish that has recently spread in colonies. Many colonizers are still unsure whether this ingredient is called "冶龙" or "治龙", and even the people who developed this dish say they don't know
